value.name: Police officer injured in random attack in Westchester County
value.description: Authorities say the assailant ran up behind the sergeant and began repeatedly stabbing and slashing him with an unknown weapon.

video.name: Police officer injured in random attack in Westchester County

value.name: West Garfield Park man charged with weekend shooting of woman in River North, ordered held without bail
value.description: A 37-year-old West Garfield Park man is accused of shooting a 35-year-old woman in the River North neighborhood early Sunday morning during a dispute between two groups of people, Chicago police said.
